member.name: M:WebExtreme.UserManagement.UserManager.IsMemberOf(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: checks if the users belongs to a given group in active directory

member.name: M:WebExtreme.UserManagement.UserManager.IsAuthenticated(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates a user against active directory and returns true or false for a given user/password.
